title: Gothic style font help
content:
Any help would be appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [picture 2014-04-10 at 11.44.08 AM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831054750/http:/typophile.com/files/picture%202014-04-10%20at%2011.44.08%20AM.jpg) | 16.24 KB |
author: darksympho

comments.content:
Here is another example of the same font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831054750im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_5695.jpg)

Letter \_o\_ appears three times, each one shaped differently. So it's hand lettered. Not a consistent style for the capitals.  
As for the lower case, there is some vague similarity to fonts such as Terragon [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tarragon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831054750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tarragon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tarragon/") or Clairvaux [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clairvaux/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831054750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clairvaux/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clairvaux/")  
Don
